alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Nelson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 9:58AM EST until January 05 at 3:09PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Rolling Fork River near Boston affecting Nelson and Hardin Counties. .Heavy rain from the past 12 hours will cause the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rolling Fork River near Boston. * WHEN...From late tonight to Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Agricultural bottomland is covered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 28.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 36.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 35.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued this evening.
